local_intent: Detect the red plate, move above it (offset 0.03m), lower until contact, place the held white plate on the red surface, release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already grasped and secure
Camera can see the red_plate from current pose
Workspace clear for lowering and placement
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase steps: detect red_plate (with retries), MoveAbove (offset 0.03), LowerUntilContact, PlaceAt on red_plate_surface, OpenGripper, then Retreat.
